channel.title: Objects/items
channel.description:
[b][i]what i've done:[/i][/b] i have made a box so you click on the box and it deletes a coin and gives you a bow.
[b][i]problem:[/i][/b]how would i make it to where you need the coin to get a pot? not just delete the item [b]if[/b] you have it.
here is what i have so far. [code]case 10694: deleteItem(0995, GetItemSlot(0995), 1); addItem(0050, 1); break;[/code]
